summary:
Account Health: Poor (47/100)

Analysed 9 campaigns with total spend of £2,857 and blended ROAS of 1.40x.

Detected 7 issues requiring attention.

recommendations.title: Low ROAS Performance
campaign_names: T2MD | Search | Memorial Gift 150 20/5 140 7/4 Port 150  16/6 AI Max 28/7 144
T2MD | Search | Trees Port 150 16/6 Ai 4/8 Lemon paused 20/8 131 3/9
recommendations.recommendation:
ROAS Performance Below Target

5 campaign(s) are performing below the target ROAS of 1.6x. This represents £1158 in spend generating 0.00x average return.

Root Cause Analysis:
- Campaign efficiency is 0% below target
- May indicate bidding strategy misalignment, poor product/ad relevance, or targeting issues

Recommendation:
1. Review bidding strategy - consider adjusting Target ROAS or switching to Maximize Conversion Value
2. Analyse Search Terms report for wasted spend on irrelevant queries
3. Review product feed quality (if Shopping/PMax) - ensure titles, descriptions optimised
4. Check audience targeting for efficiency opportunities

kb_articles.title: Google and Microsoft: How their Performance Max approaches align and diverge

next_steps: Review Search Terms report for the last 30 days
Analyse landing page relevance and conversion rate
Consider bid strategy adjustment (Target ROAS → Maximize Conversion Value test)

recommendations.title: High Spend, Low Performance
recommendations.recommendation:
High Spend, Low Performance Campaigns

1 campaign(s) with significant spend (£121 total) are underperforming at 0.54x ROAS.

Root Cause Analysis:
- Campaigns are not profitable - spending more than revenue generated
- This is a critical waste of budget

Recommendation:
1. IMMEDIATE: Pause or reduce budgets for campaigns with ROAS <1.0x
2. Diagnose: Review Search Terms, Placements, Audience targeting for waste
3. Test: If pausing isn't an option, create tightly controlled test with lower budget
4. Consider: If consistently unprofitable, campaign may not be viable for this business

kb_articles.title: Keep CALM: New model design could fix high enterprise AI costs
kb_articles.preview: title: CALM Architecture: New AI Model Design to Reduce Enterprise Deployment Costs

kb_articles.title: 4 Techniques to Optimize Your LLM Prompts for Cost, Latency and Performance
kb_articles.preview: title: 4 Techniques to Optimize LLM Prompts for Cost, Latency, and Performance

next_steps: Export Search Terms report to identify wasted spend
Add negative keywords for irrelevant queries
Reduce budgets by 50% for campaigns with 0.5-1.0x ROAS while diagnosing

recommendations.title: Budget Constraints
recommendations.recommendation:
Budget Constraints Limiting Performance

1 campaign(s) are losing impressions due to budget constraints (avg 58% Lost IS Budget).

Root Cause Analysis:
- Campaigns are performing well but can't spend more due to daily budget caps
- Potential revenue being left on the table

Recommendation:
1. Assess performance: Campaigns with ROAS >1.2800000000000002x should receive budget increases
2. Reallocate budget from lower-performing campaigns
3. Consider increasing overall account budget if all campaigns are constrained
4. Monitor pacing - ensure budgets aren't exhausted early in the day

next_steps: Calculate incremental revenue opportunity (Lost IS × current revenue)
Identify budget reallocation candidates (campaigns with ROAS <target)
Test 20% budget increase for 7 days, monitor ROAS stability
Set up budget alerts to catch constraints earlier
